events.name: analytics_consent
events.description: User opts in or opts out for analytics

properties.name: type
properties.description: Information if a user gave consent

properties.name: source
properties.description: Source where a user gave or declined analytics consent

events.name: philips_network_join
events.description: User successfully completed connection or failed to connect to the Philips network

properties.name: status
properties.description: Status of joining to the Philips network

properties.name: source
properties.description: Part of the app from which a user joined Philips network

events.name: machine_phone_pair
events.description: User successfully completed pairing or failed to pair phone with the coffee machine

properties.name: status
properties.description: Status of phone pairing to the Coffee machine

events.name: machine_wifi_connect
events.description: User successfully completed connection or failed connect Coffee machine to the local WiFi network

properties.name: status
properties.description: Status of the Coffee machine connecting to the WiFi network

properties.name: source
properties.description: Source of the machine connecting to the WiFi network

events.name: machine_turn_on
events.description: User turned on the Coffee machine from the app

events.name: machine_turn_off
events.description: User turned off the Coffee machine from the app

events.name: machine_remove
events.description: User removed Coffee machine from the app

events.name: alexa_connect
events.description: User connects or fails to connect Alexa

userProperties.name: machine_model
userProperties.description: Model of the Coffee machine (e.g. Philips 3200 LatteGo)

userProperties.name: analytics_consent
userProperties.description: User segmentation by the analytics consent (opt in/opt out). Should be set and updated in two locations, onboarding and settings
